attributes.additional_details:
I want all animals to be loved and safe in a place where they feel safe and protected. 
They deserve to be free and not in captivity because this is a form of animal cruelty.
attributes.background:
I want you to ban testing on animals for our products, When there are other alternatives to animal testing.
I want it to be illegal to test on any animal and to free the animals that are cruelly held in captivity.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about animal testing, however it's not clear what 'products' you want this to apply to. 

You might like to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

Bring into effect a ban on research & testing on dogs and cats in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618053

Ban the sale of cosmetic products that have been tested on animals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619585
